thread.title: Status Not Quo joins the Kentico Partner Program
thread.title_full: Status Not Quo joins the Kentico Partner Program

author: Scott Capistrano
title: Status Not Quo joins the Kentico Partner Program
text:
Status Not Quo announced it has entered a Certified Partnership with Kentico Software (http://www.kentico.com) Valencia, CA, 10/11/15 — Status Not Quo, “Not your ordinary consulting firm”, today announced it has entered a Certified Partnership with Kentico Software (http://www.kentico.com), the Web Content and Customer Experience Management provider, to provide customers with the most leading edge blend of user focused Content Management System (CMS), combined with the highest level of design and technical expertise provided by the robust Microsoft .NET development platform.
Status Not Quo is known for designing and executing the projects that other designers and software developers dread. SNQ creates solutions that meet business and ROI requirements based on a technological foundation, and supports clients both nationally and globally. SNQ’s key strategic areas of focus are web, digital marketing, customer relationship management, and mobile.
“SNQ chose Kentico’s CMS platform due to its successfully combination of a user centric approach supported by the robust capabilities found in a custom .NET programming stack. Our designs and solutions are never “templated or boiler plate”; Kentico allows us to blend the benefits of a CMS with the features of a custom built solution”, said Scott Capistrano, SNQ’s President.
"It's important to choose the solution that's right for your web project, but success also depends on the skills and expertise of the company that delivers your website," said Pavlina Mahovska, Channel Marketing Manager at Kentico. "Through this partnership, we are sure that the end users of our product will be provided with top-level professional services."
About Status Not Quo
Status Not Quo (SNQ) is a Creative Services and Technical Production firm. We provide turnkey services beginning with digital marketing strategy, brand alignment, and creative design, with that vision executed and implemented utilizing the highest caliber of programming expertise and technologies. This is all built upon an exceptional foundation of hands-on industry experience in the areas of marketing, operations, and finance.
We are experts at developing comprehensive technology strategies based on a company’s key strategic objectives and goals, while leveraging the company’s strengths and minimizing their weaknesses. We work with clients on a longer-term basis as partners. SNQ is completely objective driven, and we work jointly with our clients to continually evaluate and refine the strategic objectives to help ensure their success.
About Kentico
Kentico brings smart integrated digital marketing to businesses of all sizes with a comprehensive suite of solutions. With Kentico’s Web Content Management, Online Marketing, E-commerce, Online Communities, and Intranet & Collaboration solutions, clients can deliver superior cross-channel customer experiences across all devices. Based on the Microsoft .NET platform, Kentico comes with 450 web parts and fully documented API and is available on premise or in the cloud. Flexible, robust and scalable, Kentico delivers right-first-time technology, out-of-the-box speed, and affordable sophistication to help customers meet their goals faster and more profitably.
About Kentico Software
Founded in 2004, Kentico is headquartered in the Czech Republic with offices in the US, UK, and Australia. A Microsoft Gold Certified Partner with 1,100 digital agency partners, Kentico powers more than 18,000 websites in 90 countries. Customers include Bacardi; Great British Chefs; Gibson; Mazda; Mighty River Power; Run and Become; Sony; Vodafone.
All product and company names herein may be trademarks of their respective owners.
